com.mesosphere.sdk.testing

Interface Send

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SimulationTick
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SendOffer, SendTaskStatus

    public interface Send
extends SimulationTick
    A type of SimulationTick that performs an operation against the scheduler.

      • replacePod

        static Send replacePod(java.lang.String podName)
        Initiates the replacement of a pod through a call to PodResource#replacePod(String).

      • emptyOffers

        static Send emptyOffers()
        Triggers offer processing against an empty list of offers. This is useful for bumping the plan status. In practice this would happen automatically every few seconds, but we need to do it manually in these tests. See OfferProcessor.

      • send

        void send(ClusterState state,
          SchedulerDriver mockDriver,
          Scheduler scheduler)
        Performs an action against the provided scheduler, optionally updating the provided cluster state to reflect the action.
        Parameters:
        state - the cluster's current state, containing a history of e.g. recent offers and launched tasks
        mockDriver - a mock SchedulerDriver which should be passed through to the scheduler when making any calls
        scheduler - the Mesos Scheduler under test
